tasks.label: Android Clean Deploy RF8R21KHRDB
tasks.command: adb -s RF8R21KHRDB uninstall com.vilogamesstudio.pmstools || true && dotnet clean /home/zamme/Maui_Projects/PmSTools/PmSTools/PmSTools.csproj -c Release -f net10.0-android && dotnet build -t:Run -p:Configuration=Release -f net10.0-android -p:AdbTarget=-s%20RF8R21KHRDB -p:CustomAfterMicrosoftCSharpTargets=/home/zamme/.vscode/extensions/ms-dotnettools.dotnet-maui-1.13.20-linux-x64/dist/resources/Custom.After.Microsoft.CSharp.targets -p:MauiVSCodeBuildOutputFile=/tmp/dotnet-maui/maui-vsc-e384c21a-f824-4977-980b-b5699a26366b.json -p:AndroidSdkDirectory=/home/zamme/Android/Sdk -p:JavaSdkDirectory=/usr/lib/jvm/java-21-openjdk-amd64 -p:EnableDiagnostics=True -p:EnableMauiXamlDiagnostics=True /home/zamme/Maui_Projects/PmSTools/PmSTools/PmSTools.csproj
